column4: hi i am using xubuntu 8.0.4 LTS and i want to copy a theme from the desktop to the theme folder, after doing a bit of searching i came up with the command cp, but can anyone enlighten me as how to use it, eg. i want to copy the file named Xaphire from  the desktop to file system=>usr/share/themes
Type in the command `man cp` and read how to use cp.
I could, but If you use linux you need to learn to utilize the documentation. Or you will never learn how to do anything.
